content: @simulacrum Is there a way to see how long each benchmark takes to run, plus the whole suite? https://perf.rust-lang.org/status.html has that for the in-progress run, but I would like to be able to see what effect the addition/removal/upgrading of benchmarks is having on overall CI times. Because that will dictate how much room we have for additional benchmarks.
You mean a sum across the numbers there? Not sure I follow
Those are the metrics (which is just a sum across the status page) from the last 7 days.
Yes, that's exactly what I want. How did you view that?
(Breaking it down per benchmark would also be useful)

The status page should basically have this data already, just instantaneous vs. graphed. (The raw data to graph it is in the db if we wanted it, too).

The screenshot is from grafana, which is probably not too hard to grant access to but I would need to figure out the ACL setup there.
Probably easier just to get you to screenshot it when I need it, which won't be often :smile:
